title: Refactor BaseParser from module to class for streaming parsing
description: Convert BaseParser from a module to a class following Apache PDFBox architecture. The current module reads bytes incrementally but is not used consistently. Need to create a proper BaseParser class that reads from RandomAccessRead byte-by-byte, mirroring Java BaseParser logic exactly. This will eliminate the performance issue where PDFScanner reads entire file sections into memory.

title: Create comprehensive porting plan for Crystal PDFBox
description: Create plan.md outlining the strategy for porting Apache PDFBox to Crystal, including milestones, approach, Crystal idioms, and Prawn compatibility layer.
close_reason:
Created comprehensive plan.md file outlining:
- 9 milestones for porting Apache PDFBox to Crystal
- Crystal idioms and standard library usage
- Test porting strategy
- Prawn compatibility layer
- Beads issue tracking approach
- Development workflow and success metrics

title: Profile remaining PDF loading performance bottlenecks
description: PDFBOX-3947-670064.pdf loads in ~60 seconds despite optimized xref parsing. Need to profile remaining time (after xref parsing and brute-force search). Likely in object stream parsing, page tree resolution, or repeated decompression. Add more granular timing logs and identify hotspots.

title: Port tests from io/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/io
description: Port all test files from Apache PDFBox directory io/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/io to Crystal specs.

title: Ensure xref merging resolves latest object versions
description: When parsing multiple xref sections (traditional + streams), ensure latest object versions override older ones. Important for catalog resolution if multiple catalog versions exist in PDF incremental updates.

title: Port tests from pdfbox/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/rendering
description: Port all test files from Apache PDFBox directory pdfbox/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/rendering to Crystal specs.

title: Integrate XrefTrailerResolver into Parser for xref/trailer resolution
description: Modify Parser to use XrefTrailerResolver to collect xref/trailer objects and resolve using startxref and Prev chain.

title: Implement lazy object resolution similar to Apache PDFBox
description: Port Apache PDFBox lazy object resolution pattern: COSObject should have reference to parser and resolve objects lazily via getObject() method. Parser should maintain object pool. This will fix PageLabels objects not being resolved.

title: Set up Crystal project structure mirroring PDFBox modules
description: Create Crystal source directory structure matching Apache PDFBox modules: pdfbox/, fontbox/, xmpbox/, io/, tools/. Ensure proper module naming and organization.
close_reason:
Created Crystal project structure mirroring Apache PDFBox modules:
- Created directory structure: pdfbox/, fontbox/, xmpbox/, io/, tools/
- Created module files: pdfbox/cos.cr, pdfbox/pdmodel.cr, pdfbox/io.cr
- Created top-level modules: fontbox.cr, xmpbox.cr, tools.cr
- Updated main pdfbox.cr to require all modules
- Updated spec tests to test new structure
- All tests pass, code formatted and linted

title: Make Parser inherit from ICOSParser and implement required methods
description: Parser class needs to inherit from Cos::ICOSParser abstract class and implement both abstract methods: dereference_object and create_random_access_read_view. This is the first step in implementing lazy object resolution.

title: Port tests from pdfbox/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdmodel/interactive/annotation
description: Port all test files from Apache PDFBox directory pdfbox/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdmodel/interactive/annotation to Crystal specs.

title: Implement parseCOSStream method matching Java COSParser
description: Implement parseCOSStream method in COSParser with proper stream length handling, endstream detection, and validation. Requires implementing helper methods: getLength, validateStreamLength, readUntilEndStream.

title: Fix PDFScanner reading entire file for each object causing 90ms parse times
Add encryption/decryption stubs to COSParser
description: Implement placeholder security methods to allow encrypted PDFs to load: getEncryption, getAccessPermission, prepareDecryption, getSecurityHandler. These can return nil/empty values initially.

title: Implement basic PDF header parsing/writing
description: Implement PDF version header detection in Parser and header writing in Writer. PDF headers look like '%PDF-1.4' followed by binary comment '%âãÏÓ'.

title: Ensure proper cleanup in object stream cache
description: Make sure objects are removed from cache after dereferencing or handle cache lifecycle properly

title: Test with page labels test to verify objects are resolved
description: After implementing lazy resolution, run the page labels test (spec/pdfbox/pdmodel/page_labels_spec.cr) to verify that objects 1350, 1358, 1360 are properly resolved and page labels are generated correctly.

title: Port PDFObjectStreamParser from Apache PDFBox
description: Complete port of Apache PDFBox PDFObjectStreamParser.java to Crystal. This class is essential for parsing compressed object streams in PDF 1.5+ files. Extends COSParser and handles object stream decompression and parsing.

title: Port tests from xmpbox/src/test/java/org/apache/xmpbox/parser
description: Port all test files from Apache PDFBox directory xmpbox/src/test/java/org/apache/xmpbox/parser to Crystal specs.

title: Implement hex escape handling in parse_name to match Java parseCOSName
description: Current parse_name delegates to read_name which doesn't handle # hex escapes. Need to implement proper parse_name matching Java COSParser parseCOSName method including hex escape decoding and UTF-8 fallback.

title: Parse catalog and pages objects from xref
description:
Parse catalog and pages objects from xref table. Currently parser only counts pages from xref entries but doesn't actually parse the catalog, pages, and page dictionaries. Need to implement full object parsing to extract document structure and metadata.

DEPENDS ON:
- pdfbox-j6t: Port TestPDDocumentCatalog tests
- pdfbox-laf: Port TestPDFParser tests  
- pdfbox-gt2: Port TestCOSParser tests

These tests should be ported first (TDD approach) to ensure implementation is correct.

title: Integrate XrefParser into Parser's collect_xref_sections
description:
Replace Parser.collect_xref_sections and merge_xref_sections with XrefParser.

**Current Status:**
- XrefParser partially implements xref chain parsing (tables + dictionary parsing for streams)
- Missing full xref stream data parsing (PDFXrefStreamParser port needed)
- XrefTrailerResolver already integrated into Parser (working)

**Integration Steps:**
1. Add require "./xref_parser" to parser.cr
2. Modify collect_xref_sections to use XrefParser.parse_xref
3. Get xref table and trailer from XrefParser instance
4. Set @xref and @trailer on Parser instance
5. Handle hybrid xref streams (XRefStm) via XrefParser
6. Ensure backward compatibility (all 216 tests must pass)
7. Remove old collect_xref_sections/merge_xref_sections logic after verification

**Dependencies:**
- Complete xref stream parsing in XrefParser (separate issue)
- May need to port PDFXrefStreamParser from Java for full xref stream support

**Testing:**
- Run existing test suite
- Test with PDFs containing xref tables only
- Test with PDFs containing xref streams only
- Test with hybrid PDFs (XRefStm)
- Test with incremental updates (/Prev chains)

title: Optimize brute-force search for object streams (bf_search_for_obj_streams_xref)
description: bf_search_for_obj_streams_xref takes ~1.7 seconds due to inefficient find_string scanning. Should apply memory-based scanning similar to bf_search_for_objects optimization. Load file range into memory and search for 'stream' pattern once.

title: Implement PDFIO utilities for parser and writer
description: Implement basic PDFIO utility functions in both pdfparser.cr and pdfwriter.cr: skip_whitespace, peek, read/write string/name/number, etc. These are foundational for parsing/writing PDF syntax.

title: Implement PDFObjectStreamParser constructor
description: Port PDFObjectStreamParser constructor: initialize with COSStream and COSDocument, extract /N (numberOfObjects) and /First (firstObject) values from stream dictionary, validate values.

title: Port remaining PDF parser tests from Apache PDFBox
description: Port remaining PDF parser tests from Apache PDFBox to Crystal specs. This includes tests for: PDFBOX-3208, 3783, 3785, 3940, 3947, 3948, 3949, 3950, 3951, 3964, 3977, 4338, 4339, 4153, 4490, 5025 and parse genko file. Also port other parser test files: TestBaseParser, TestCOSParser, PDFStreamParserTest, PDFObjectStreamParserTest, EndstreamFilterStreamTest.

title: Port COSParser.java completely to match Apache PDFBox logic

description: Port parseAllObjects() method: parse all objects in stream, handle indexNeeded logic for duplicate object numbers, return map of COSObjectKey to COSBase.

title: Implement dereference_object method in Parser
description: Parser needs to implement dereference_object method from ICOSParser interface. This method should resolve Cos::Object using object pool and parse object dynamically similar to Apache PDFBox's COSParser.dereferenceCOSObject.

title: Port PDFStreamParserTest.java to Crystal specs
description: Port all tests from Apache PDFBox PDFStreamParserTest.java to Crystal spec. PDFStreamParserTest contains content stream parsing tests.

title: Implement PDF/FDF header parsing in COSParser
description: Add parsePDFHeader and parseFDFHeader methods to detect PDF version and format. Required for proper file type detection.

title: Port TestPDFParser.java to Crystal specs
description: Port all tests from Apache PDFBox TestPDFParser.java to Crystal spec/pdfbox/pdfparser_spec.cr. This includes tests for PDFBOX-3208, 3783, 3785, 3940, 3947, 3948, 3949, 3950, 3951, 3964, 3977, 4338, 4339, 4153, 4490, 5025 and parse genko file.

title: Port tests from pdfbox/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdmodel/graphics/blend
description: Port all test files from Apache PDFBox directory pdfbox/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdmodel/graphics/blend to Crystal specs.

title: Remove PDFScanner and replace with BaseParser/COSParser methods to match Apache PDFBox
description: Apache PDFBox doesn't use a Scanner class - it uses BaseParser/COSParser for incremental byte reading. Our PDFScanner class loads chunks into memory and uses StringScanner, which is inefficient and doesn't match the Apache architecture. Need to replace all PDFScanner usage with BaseParser/COSParser methods: 1. parse_object_header should use BaseParser methods (read_number, skip_spaces, read_expected_string). 2. parse_xref should use BaseParser instead of PDFScanner. 3. brute_force_parser should use BaseParser. 4. Remove PDFScanner class entirely once all usage is replaced.

title: Reduce PDFScanner usage in utility functions
Create basic I/O layer using Crystal's IO classes
description: Implement I/O layer for PDF reading/writing using Crystal's IO, File, and Stream classes. Replace Java streams with Crystal equivalents.
close_reason: Implemented basic I/O layer: RandomAccessRead interface with Memory and File implementations, I/O utility functions. Basic functionality for PDF reading/writing. More advanced features (scratch files, stream caching, etc.) will be added in later milestones.

title: Port tests from pdfbox/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser
description: Port all test files from Apache PDFBox directory pdfbox/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser to Crystal specs.

title: Implement page labels extraction from catalog
Update parse_reference to create Cos::Object with parser and key
description: ObjectParser.parse_reference method needs to create Cos::Object instances with parser reference and ObjectKey instead of creating empty Cos::Object instances. This ensures indirect references remain unresolved until accessed.

title: Add decompressed_objects cache field to Parser class
Port PDF parser tests from Apache PDFBox
description: Port all PDF parser test files from Apache PDFBox Java to Crystal specs. Files include: TestCOSParser.java, TestPDFParser.java, TestBaseParser.java, PDFStreamParserTest.java, PDFObjectStreamParserTest.java, EndstreamFilterStreamTest.java.

title: Complete BruteForceParser implementation for PDFBOX-3947 hang fix
description:
BruteForceParser is partially implemented but not complete. The PDFBOX-3947-670064.pdf still hangs when loaded with lenient mode. Need to:
1. Implement missing methods from Apache PDFBox BruteForceParser (bfSearchForTrailer, searchForTrailerItems)
2. Fix performance issues in brute-force search (string? method is inefficient)
3. Ensure brute-force parser is called appropriately (currently hangs in normal parsing before brute-force kicks in)
4. Fix any infinite loops in object stream parsing
5. Remove debug puts statements from ObjectParser (replaced with Log.debug)
Reference: Apache PDFBox BruteForceParser.java

title: Implement basic COS object writing
description: Implement COSWriter methods in pdfwriter.cr to write individual COS objects (dictionary, array, string, name, number, boolean, null, stream). These should use PDFIO utilities.

title: Optimize PNG predictor performance (apply_png_predictor)
description: PNG predictor (apply_png_predictor) processes 12798 rows with 4 columns. Initial optimization attempt failed due to performance issues in custom implementation. Need to profile and identify why simple pointer-based loop is slow. Possibly due to Crystal bounds checking or type inference. Consider using SIMD or examining Apache PDFBox implementation for optimizations.
close_reason: Optimized with fast UP filter implementation (17,500x speedup: 1400ms -> 0.08ms)

title: Port core COS (Cos Object System) types
description: Port COSBase, COSObject, COSArray, COSDictionary, COSName, COSString, COSInteger, COSBoolean, COSFloat. Use Crystal classes/structs with proper typing and Crystal idioms.
close_reason: Implemented basic COS types: Boolean, Integer, Float, String, Name, Array, Dictionary, Stream, Object, Null. Basic functionality implemented with Crystal idioms. More advanced features (visitor pattern, serialization, etc.) will be added in later milestones.

title: Update parse_object_from_stream to use object pool
description: Parser.parse_object_from_stream should check object pool first and create Cos::Object with parser reference for lazy resolution of objects within compressed object streams.

Fix PDFStreamParser inline image parsing failing tests

Four tests failing in PDFStreamParser spec:
1. parses ID with Q operator
2. parses ID with EMC operator

4. handles boundary whitespace lengths

The parser only returns 1 token (ID operator) instead of 2 tokens (ID + following operator). Need to debug why second operator not parsed.

description: Hang persists because BruteForceParser implementation is incomplete (missing methods, performance issues). Blocked by pdfbox-m19 and pdfbox-9cb.

comments.author: Dominic Sisneros
comments.text: Added debug logging and safety limits. Hang persists; root cause appears to be missing brute-force search for broken object streams. Parser gets stuck before reaching object stream parsing (likely in catalog resolution). Need to implement brute-force search (bfSearchForObjStreams) from Apache PDFBox.

title: Port BruteForceParser with tests for broken PDF handling
description: Core BruteForceParser implemented with bf_search_for_objects, bf_search_for_obj_streams_xref, etc. Integration with parser via lenient flag. However, PDFBOX-3947-670064.pdf still hangs due to missing methods (bfSearchForTrailer, searchForTrailerItems) and performance issues. Created pdfbox-9cb for remaining work.
notes: Analyzed current implementation. Missing rebuildTrailer method. Need to implement rebuild_trailer in BruteForceParser and integrate into Parser when xref_offset is nil or trailer missing Root. Also need to optimize string? method performance.

comments.author: Dominic Sisneros
comments.text:
Key methods to port from Apache PDFBox BruteForceParser.java:

1. Constructor: BruteForceParser(COSDocument, COSParser)
2. bfSearchForObjects() - Main entry point
3. bfSearchForObjStreams(Map<COSObjectKey, Long>) - Critical for PDFBOX-3947
4. bfSearchForObjStreamOffsets() - Find object stream offsets
5. bfSearchForXRefTables() - Find xref tables
6. bfSearchForXRefStreams() - Find xref streams  
7. bfSearchForTrailer(COSDictionary) - Find trailer
8. bfSearchForLastEOFMarker() - Find last EOF
9. bfSearchForXRef(long) - Search for xref offset
10. getBFCOSObjectOffsets() - Get found objects

Integration points:
- COSParser.getBruteForceParser() method
- XrefParser uses brute force when normal parsing fails
- PDFParser fallback mechanism

Test to port: testPDFBox3977 (brute force search for /Info dictionary)
Also ensure PDFBOX-3947, 3948, 3949 tests pass after implementation.

title: Implement check_xref_offsets in XrefParser
description: Port Java checkXrefOffsets method to validate xref entries point to valid object headers. Includes findObjectKey logic and brute force fallback.

title: Port BaseParser.java completely to match Apache PDFBox logic
description: Complete port of Apache PDFBox BaseParser.java to ensure all methods match Java implementation exactly. Verify each method's logic, error handling, and edge cases.

title: Verify skipWhiteSpaces/skipLinebreak methods match Java BaseParser
description: Check skip_white_spaces, skip_linebreak, and skip_linebreak_byte methods match Java BaseParser logic exactly, including edge cases for CR/LF/CRLF handling.

title: Verify isEndOfName method matches Java BaseParser
description: Check end_of_name? method matches Java BaseParser.isEndOfName() logic exactly: all termination characters (space, CR, LF, tab, >, <, [, /, ], ), (, null, form feed, %, -1).

title: Verify readString method matches Java BaseParser
description: Check read_string method matches Java BaseParser.readString() logic exactly: skipSpaces first, reading until isEndOfName, rewind behavior, never returns null.

title: Verify readExpectedString(char[]) method matches Java BaseParser
description: Check read_expected_string(Array(Char)) method matches Java BaseParser.readExpectedString(char[]) logic exactly: skipSpaces parameter handling, character-by-character comparison, error messages with position.

title: Verify isEOF method matches Java BaseParser
description: Check eof? method matches Java BaseParser.isEOF() logic exactly: delegates to source.isEOF().

title: Verify BaseParser constructor and constants match Java BaseParser
description: Check BaseParser constructor and constant definitions (MAX_LENGTH_LONG, ASCII_NULL, ASCII_TAB, ASCII_LF, ASCII_FF, ASCII_CR, ASCII_ZERO, ASCII_NINE, ASCII_SPACE) match Java BaseParser exactly.

title: Verify readLiteralString with octal escapes and backslash handling
description: Check read_literal_string method matches Java BaseParser logic exactly, including octal escapes (1-3 digits), backslash escapes (n, r, t, b, f, etc.), line continuation with CR/LF, and checkForEndOfString handling.

title: Verify readString/readExpectedString/readExpectedChar methods
description: Check read_string, read_expected_string (Array(Char) and String overloads), and read_expected_char methods match Java BaseParser logic exactly, including error messages and position reporting.

title: Verify isEndOfName and other predicate methods
description: Check end_of_name?, eol?, lf?, cr?, whitespace?, space?, digit?, hex_digit? methods match Java BaseParser static methods exactly, including all ASCII code comparisons.

title: Verify readInt/readLong/readStringNumber methods
description: Check read_int, read_long, and read_string_number methods match Java BaseParser logic exactly, including MAX_LENGTH_LONG check, error handling for NumberFormatException, and rewind behavior on parse failure.

title: Verify skipSpaces with comment handling
description: Check skip_spaces method matches Java BaseParser logic exactly, including comment handling (37 = '%'), whitespace skipping, and rewind behavior.

title: Verify skipWhiteSpaces method matches Java BaseParser
description: Check skip_white_spaces method matches Java BaseParser.skipWhiteSpaces() logic exactly: PDF Ref 3.2.7 stream handling, CRLF/LF skipping, whitespace removal before linebreak, rewind behavior.

title: Verify skipLinebreak method matches Java BaseParser
description: Check skip_linebreak and skip_linebreak_byte methods match Java BaseParser.skipLinebreak() logic exactly: CR, LF, CRLF handling, rewind behavior, return values.

title: Verify checkForEndOfString method matches Java BaseParser
description: Check check_for_end_of_string method matches Java BaseParser.checkForEndOfString() logic exactly: braces handling, next 3 bytes checking, valid end-of-string indicators (CR+LF+'/', CR+LF+'>', etc.).

title: Complete compressed object stream parsing implementation
description:
Complete implementation of compressed object stream parsing to extract PageLabels objects (1350, 1352, 1358, 1360) from test_pagelabels.pdf.

Current progress:
1. XRef stream parsing with PNG predictor decoding works correctly
2. Added parse_object_from_stream and parse_object_stream_contents methods
3. Object stream 1 identified as containing compressed objects 13, 14, 15 (and likely PageLabels objects)
4. Added decode_stream_data method for handling FlateDecode + Predictor streams

Remaining work:
1. Object stream 1 needs to be parsed (decompressed, object number/offset pairs extracted)
2. Extract objects by index from stream data
3. Test with object 13 (simple object) first
4. Then extract PageLabels objects 1350, 1352, 1358, 1360
5. Ensure catalog references PageLabels (may need to find correct catalog version)

This is required to fix failing test in spec/pdfbox/document_catalog_spec.cr:13

title: Add object pool to Parser
description: Parser needs an object pool (Hash of ObjectKey to Cos::Object) similar to Apache PDFBox's COSDocument.objectPool. This pool caches partially resolved objects and allows reuse during lazy resolution.

title: Port tests from examples/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/examples/interactive/form
description: Port all test files from Apache PDFBox directory examples/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/examples/interactive/form to Crystal specs. This includes tests related to interactive forms functionality.

title: Define missing XRef and XRefEntry classes in pdfparser module
Implement compressed object stream parsing
notes: Partially implemented: XRef stream parsing with PNG predictor works. Added parse_object_from_stream and parse_object_stream_contents methods. Object stream 1 identified. Need to complete object extraction from stream data. Continued in pdfbox-o4u.

title: Port tests from pdfbox/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdmodel/documentinterchange/logicalstructure
description: Port all test files from Apache PDFBox directory pdfbox/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdmodel/documentinterchange/logicalstructure to Crystal specs.

title: Implement create_random_access_read_view method in Parser
description: Parser needs to implement create_random_access_read_view method from ICOSParser interface. This method should create a RandomAccessReadView for reading stream data, similar to Apache PDFBox's COSParser.createRandomAccessReadView.

title: Create PDFObjectStreamParser class file with inheritance structure
Complete XrefParser implementation
description:
Complete the XrefParser implementation to fully replace Parser's collect_xref_sections.

**Completed:**
- ✅ parse_xref method implemented (chain parsing logic with /Prev loop detection)
- ✅ parse_startxref, check_xref_offset, check_xref_stream_offset, calculate_xref_fixed_offset implemented
- ✅ parse_xref_table implemented (based on existing Parser logic)
- ✅ parse_trailer implemented (based on Java logic)
- ✅ parser_as_parser helper added for Parser instance access
- ✅ parse_xref_obj_stream partially implemented (parses dictionary, gets /Prev, but missing stream data parsing)
- ✅ Renamed is_string to string? per Crystal conventions

**Remaining Work:**
1. **Implement full xref stream parsing** - parse_xref_obj_stream currently only parses dictionary
   - Need to parse stream data and add entries to XrefTrailerResolver
   - Options: Port PDFXrefStreamParser from Java or reuse Parser.parse_xref_stream logic
2. **Implement check_xref_offsets** - Validate object offsets (currently stub)
3. **Port PDFXrefStreamParser** from Java for proper xref stream data parsing
4. **Test with xref stream PDFs** - Ensure hybrid xrefs work

**Dependencies:**
- PDFXrefStreamParser port needed for complete xref stream support
- Integration with Parser.collect_xref_sections (separate issue pdfbox-37o2)

**References:**
- Java XrefParser source: apache_pdfbox/pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/XrefParser.java
- Java PDFXrefStreamParser source: apache_pdfbox/pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/PDFXrefStreamParser.java
- Existing Parser.parse_xref_stream method for reference

title: Port PDFXRefStream.java from Apache PDFBox
description: Port PDFXRefStream.java to represent cross-reference stream objects.

title: Clean up debug prints in production code
description: Debug prints (puts statements) are conditionally printed when @lenient is true, but they clutter test output and may affect performance. Consider using a proper logging framework or at least making them toggleable via environment variable.

title: Port tests from fontbox/src/test/java/org/apache/fontbox/afm
description: Port all test files from Apache PDFBox directory fontbox/src/test/java/org/apache/fontbox/afm to Crystal specs.

title: Optimize xref parsing and reduce warning verbosity for corrupted PDFs
Integrate parser/writer with Document class
description: Update Document.load to use Parser and Document.save to use Writer. Create basic integration that can read/write simple PDFs.

title: Update parse_object_stream_contents to optionally parse all objects
description: Enhance parse_object_stream_contents to support parsing all objects at once and caching them, not just single object by index

title: Port tests from examples/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/examples/rendering
description: Port all test files from Apache PDFBox directory examples/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/examples/rendering to Crystal specs.

title: Port tests from tools/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/tools/imageio
description: Port all test files from Apache PDFBox directory tools/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/tools/imageio to Crystal specs.

title: Port tests from fontbox/src/test/java/org/apache/fontbox/cmap
description: Port all test files from Apache PDFBox directory fontbox/src/test/java/org/apache/fontbox/cmap to Crystal specs.

title: Complete XRef refactoring to support duplicate object numbers in compressed streams
description: Need to complete XRef refactoring started but not finished. Changes made: XRef now maps ObjectKey to Int64 (negative for compressed). Need to update: 1) parse_catalog_from_trailer method uses xref[Int64], 2) Other places that assume XRefEntry return type, 3) Ensure all xref parsing (traditional and stream) sets correct stream_index for compressed entries, 4) Update get_object_offset to match stream_index for compressed entries, 5) Update brute_force_parser methods that use old XRef interface, 6) Add helper methods to XRef for backward compatibility.

title: Port tests from examples/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/examples/pdmodel
description: Port all test files from Apache PDFBox directory examples/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/examples/pdmodel to Crystal specs.

title: Investigate reference parsing in content streams
description: Determine if parse_number_or_reference is needed for content streams; examine Apache PDFBox's PDFStreamParser.

title: Port tests from xmpbox/src/test/java/org/apache/xmpbox
description: Port all test files from Apache PDFBox directory xmpbox/src/test/java/org/apache/xmpbox to Crystal specs.

title: Modify parse_object_from_stream to use cache
description: Update parse_object_from_stream method to check decompressed_objects cache first before parsing, similar to Apache PDFBox's parseObjectStreamObject method

title: Port tests from pdfbox/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdmodel/interactive/form
description: Port all test files from Apache PDFBox directory pdfbox/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdmodel/interactive/form to Crystal specs.

title: Port tests from pdfbox/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdmodel/graphics
description: Port all test files from Apache PDFBox directory pdfbox/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdmodel/graphics to Crystal specs.

title: Fix compilation errors in xref_parser and parser
Verify parseCOSDictionary method matches Java COSParser
Integrate XrefParser into Parser.collect_xref_sections
description: Replace existing xref parsing logic in Parser.collect_xref_sections with XrefParser.parse_xref. Ensure backward compatibility and update tests.

title: Create PDFObjectStreamParser class file with inheritance structure
description: Create src/pdfbox/pdf_parser/pdf_object_stream_parser.cr with class PDFObjectStreamParser < COSParser, add required instance variables: @number_of_objects, @first_object, @document (from COSParser).

title: Port XrefParser.java
description: Port Apache PDFBox XrefParser.java (?? lines) to Crystal. This class parses cross-reference tables.

title: Replace remaining PDFScanner usage with incremental parsing
description: After refactoring to BaseParser architecture, there are still some places using PDFScanner (e.g., brute force search, fallback paths). Replace these with incremental parsing methods where possible to maintain performance consistency and reduce memory usage.

title: Investigate missing PageLabels in catalog for test_pagelabels.pdf
notes:
Investigation findings:
1. XRef stream at offset 768 shows objects 13, 14, 15 are compressed entries pointing to object stream 1
2. PageLabels objects (1350, 1352, 1358, 1360) are likely in object stream 1
3. Catalog at offset 935 (object 17) doesn't reference PageLabels
4. Later catalog versions may exist in xref chain but need proper resolution
5. Need to complete compressed object parsing (pdfbox-pmh, pdfbox-o4u) to extract PageLabels objects
close_reason: Investigation complete: PageLabels object 1352 found in catalog, but labels_by_page_indices returns empty due to stub implementation. Need to implement proper PageLabels parsing.

title: Implement parseObject method in PDFObjectStreamParser
description: Port parseObject(long objectNumber) method: find object offset in stream, seek to position, parse object using parse_dir_object, handle indexNeeded logic for duplicate object numbers.

title: Port XrefTrailerResolver unit tests from Apache PDFBox
Port tests from pdfbox/src/test/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdmodel/graphics/optionalcontent

title: Port PDF writer tests from Apache PDFBox
description: Port all PDF writer test files from Apache PDFBox Java to Crystal specs. Files include: COSWriterTest.java, COSWriterCompressionPoolTest.java, ContentStreamWriterTest.java, COSDocumentCompressionTest.java, TestToUnicodeWriter.java.

title: Port EndstreamFilterStreamTest.java to Crystal specs
description: Port all tests from Apache PDFBox EndstreamFilterStreamTest.java to Crystal spec. EndstreamFilterStreamTest contains endstream and filter stream parsing tests.
